immediate_actions.action: Enable Web Application Firewall (WAF) on node_001 (production-web-01) to mitigate HTTP-based attacks.
Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for SSH access (port 22) on node_001 and node_002.
Encrypt database connections (conn_002) between node_001 and node_002 using TLS 1.3.
Patch node_003 (employee-laptop-05) to resolve outdated OS vulnerabilities.

short_term_improvements.action: Deploy intrusion detection system (IDS) on node_001 and node_002 to monitor for suspicious activity.
Enable encryption at rest for node_003 (employee-laptop-05) using BitLocker or equivalent.
Restrict admin privileges on node_003 to specific roles and enforce least-privilege access.

long_term_strategy.strategy: Implement zero-trust architecture with micro-segmentation across network zones (DMZ, internal, user_network).
Conduct quarterly penetration testing and vulnerability assessments to align with ISO 27001/SOC 2 requirements.
Upgrade perimeter firewall (node_004) to a next-gen firewall with advanced threat detection capabilities.
